h2_title: Where to Find the Yellow Wind Sage
content: With both pieces, you can open the door where you defeated the King of Flowing Sands, or open up the temple cellar in the Crouching Tiger Temple, or slide down past the Rock Crash Platform to the Windseal Gate.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Wind_Sage.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Wind Sage', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Yellow Wind Sage'.
The content is as follows:
With both pieces, you can open the door where you defeated the King of Flowing Sands, or open up the temple cellar in the Crouching Tiger Temple, or slide down past the Rock Crash Platform to the Windseal Gate.
